headline: How The Exelon (EXC) Story Is Shifting As Analysts Rework Targets And Fair Value
summary: Exelon’s updated fair value estimate of US$49.94, up from US$48.75, sets a fresh reference point for how analysts are framing its longer term potential. Recent research activity, with price targets clustering in the low to mid US$50s and a mix of rating moves, shows how closely the Street is weighing Exelon’s regulated profile against its capital needs and earnings outlook. As you read on, you will see how to track these shifting targets and use them to follow the evolving narrative around...

headline: Morgan Stanley Keeps an Equal Weight Rating on Exelon Corporation (EXC)
summary: Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC) is among the 15 Best Electric Utility Stocks to Invest In Now. Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC) is among the Best Utility Stocks. On February 20, 2026, Morgan Stanley boosted Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC)’s price objective to $54 from $51, maintaining an Equal Weight rating.
